com.viaoa.ds

Class OADataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.ds.OADataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OADataSourceInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OADataSourceAuto, OADataSourceClient, OADataSourceJDBC

    public abstract class OADataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements OADataSourceInterface
    Abstract class used for defining sources for Object storage.
    A dataSource can be anything, including Relational Databases, XML data, legacy database, persistent data storage, etc.

    There are methods defined for updating, deleting, and using Queries to retreive Objects. Queries are based on the structure of Objects and not on the structure of the physical dataSource.

    The OAObject and Hub Collections have methods to automatically and naturally work with dataSources, without requiring any direct access to dataSource methods.

    OADataSource has static methods that are used to manage all created OADataSources. Subclasses of OADataSource register themselves with the static OADataSource so that they can be found and used by Objects based on the Object Class, without requiring direct access to the OADataSource object.

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    getDataSource(Class), OASelect

      • updateMany2ManyLinks

        public abstract void updateMany2ManyLinks(OAObject masterObject,
                        OAObject[] adds,
                        OAObject[] removes,
                        java.lang.String propFromMaster)
        Used by dataSources to update special requirements for handling Many2Many relationships (ex:Link Table).

        Uses the hub.masterObject, Hub.getRemovedObjects(), Hub.getAddedObjects() to find out which objects were added or removed.
        This is called by OAObject.cascadeSave/Delete methods

        Specified by:
        updateMany2ManyLinks in interface OADataSourceInterface

      • select

        public abstract OADataSourceIterator select(java.lang.Class selectClass,
                          java.lang.String queryWhere,
                          java.lang.Object[] params,
                          java.lang.String queryOrder,
                          OAObject whereObject,
                          java.lang.String propertyFromWhereObject,
                          java.lang.String extraWhere,
                          int max,
                          OAFilter filter,
                          boolean bDirty)
        Perform a query to retrieve objects from DataSource.

        See OASelect for complete description on selects/queriess.

        Specified by:
        select in interface OADataSourceInterface
        Parameters:
        selectClass - Class of object to create and return
        queryWhere - query String using property paths based on Object structure. DataSource
        params - list of values to replace '?' in queryWhere clause.
        filter - the datasource filter, used if the ds does not support queries (ex: sql) will convert query to native query language of the datasoure.
        queryOrder - sort order
        whereObject - master object to select from.
        extraWhere - added to the query.
        bDirty - true if objects should be fully populated, even if they are already loaded (in cache, etc).
        Returns:
        OADataSourceIterator that is used to return objects of type selectClass
        See Also:
        OASelect

      • select

        public OADataSourceIterator select(java.lang.Class selectClass)

        public OADataSourceIterator select(java.lang.Class selectClass,

                          java.lang.String queryOrder,
                          int max,
                          OAFilter filter,
                          boolean bDirty)

      • selectPassthru

        public abstract OADataSourceIterator selectPassthru(java.lang.Class selectClass,
                                  java.lang.String queryWhere,
                                  java.lang.String queryOrder,
                                  int max,
                                  OAFilter filter,
                                  boolean bDirty)
        Performs a select using native query language for DataSource.
        Specified by:
        selectPassthru in interface OADataSourceInterface
        Parameters:
        selectClass - Class of object to create and return
        query - query based on DataSource structure.
        Returns:
        OADataSourceIterator that is used to return objects of type selectClass
        See Also:
        OASelect

      • getAllowIdChange

        public boolean getAllowIdChange()
        Defaults to return true, allowing object Id properties to be changed. Most DataSources that use foreign keys for references will not allow the object id to be changed after the object has been saved.
        Specified by:
        getAllowIdChange in interface OADataSourceInterface
        See Also:
        OADataSourceJDBC#getAllowIdChange
